sqlMap.insert: insert into qna (qno, id, qtitle, qcont, tel, qdate) values (qna_seq.nextval, #id#, #qtitle#, #qcont#, #tel#, sysdate)
sqlMap.select: select * from qna where qstatus=#qstatus# order by qdate
sqlMap.update: update qna set rcont=#rcont#, rdate=sysdate, qstatus=#qstatus# where qno=#qno#
sqlMap.select: select * from qna where id=#id# order by qdate
